import Head from "next/head" import { Fragment, useEffect, useState } from "react" import Footer from "./footer" import Header from "./header" import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux" import axios from "axios"; import Image from "next/image" import { GetPriceHtml } from "./helpers" import Link from "next/link" import CartButton from "../components/cartButon" import CheckoutSidebar from "../components/checkoutSide" export default function Cart() { const dispatch = useDispatch() const [reload, setReload] = useState(1) const [cartProductDetails, setCartProductDetails] = useState([]) const productsInCart = useSelector(state => state.config.cart ? state.config.cart : []) useEffect(async () => { let cartData = [] for (let ci of productsInCart) { let product = await axios.get(`${process.env.API_URL}products/${ci.slug}`) product = product.data product.cartQuantity = ci.quantity cartData = [...cartData, ...[product]] } setCartProductDetails(cartData) }, [reload, cartProductDetails]) const removeProduct = (pid) => { let filteredCart = productsInCart.filter(c => c.id !== pid) dispatch({ type: "ADD_TO_CART", payload: filteredCart }) setReload(reload + 1) } return ( Cart Details

{cartProductDetails.length} Items in your bag

{ cartProductDetails.map((cp) => { return (

{cp.name}
removeProduct(cp.id)} className="fa fa-trash" aria-hidden="true">

) }) }
) }
